overview: Superstar C1R Exclusive BENJAMIN BRADLEY returns to the screen in a fetish theme movie for Director CHI CHI LARUE. Several different scenarios include bottoms who are blindfolded, tied up and duct taped, and one who is served for dinner! Director LARUE ventures into the world of obedience and dominance and in the process has crafted an exciting eye opening and jaw dropping sexual adventure.
title: Seize Your Bottom
